html:
Abrdn plc, a UK-based a global investment company, has acquired Finimize Ltd, a company that provides daily newsletter to there users to become their own financial advisers

Abrdn was advised by Goldman Sachs, Macfarlanes, and PWC on the deal, and Finimize was advised by Orrick

Deal In Brief

Finimize CEO Max Rofagha will join abrdn's leadership team.

Deal TypeAcquisition
Sub-Category100% Acquisition
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-10-29

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Finimize Ltd
Acquirer (Company)Standard Life plc

Deal Rationale

% Acquisition100%
